org.xandercat.pmdb.dao

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDaoImpl

    public interface UserDao
    Interface for user operations.
    Author:
    Scott Arnold

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(PmdbUser user, String unencryptedPassword)
      Add a new user to the system.
      String changePassword(String username, String newPassword)
      Change user password.
      void delete(String username)
      Deletes user of given username.
      Optional<PmdbUser> getUser(String username)
      Returns user of given username.
      Optional<PmdbUser> getUserByEmail(String email)
      Returns user with given email address.
      int getUserCount()
      Returns a count of the total number of users in the system regardless of user status.
      void readdUser(PmdbUser user)
      Re-add a user to the system.
      void saveUser(PmdbUser user)
      Save changes to existing user.
      List<PmdbUser> searchUsers(String searchString)
      Returns users with usernames that contain the provided search string.
      void updateLastAccess(String username)
      Update the last access timestamp for the user of given username to the current date and time.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(PmdbUser user,
             String unencryptedPassword)
      throws PmdbException
        Add a new user to the system.
        Parameters:
        user - user to add
        unencryptedPassword - new password for user
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any error occurs

      • readdUser

        void readdUser(PmdbUser user)
        throws PmdbException
        Re-add a user to the system. Typically by syncing them in from cloud storage. Special case of adding a user. When saving with this method, the encrypted password is used rather than an unencrypted password. Ensure that the encrypted password is set accordingly.
        Parameters:
        user - user to add
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any error occurs

      • saveUser

        void saveUser(PmdbUser user)
        Save changes to existing user. Should not be called for new users. Password is not updated within this method call. To change user password, call the changePassword method.
        Parameters:
        user - user to save

      • changePassword

        String changePassword(String username,
                      String newPassword)
        Change user password.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        newPassword - new unencrypted password
        Returns:
        encrypted password

      • getUser

        Optional<PmdbUser> getUser(String username)
        Returns user of given username.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Returns:
        user of given username

      • getUserByEmail

        Optional<PmdbUser> getUserByEmail(String email)
        Returns user with given email address.
        Parameters:
        email - email address
        Returns:
        user with given email address, or null if cannot be determined

      • updateLastAccess

        void updateLastAccess(String username)
        Update the last access timestamp for the user of given username to the current date and time.
        Parameters:
        username - username

      • getUserCount

        int getUserCount()
        Returns a count of the total number of users in the system regardless of user status.
        Returns:
        count of users in the system

      • searchUsers

        List<PmdbUser> searchUsers(String searchString)
        Returns users with usernames that contain the provided search string. Search is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        searchString - search string
        Returns:
        users with usernames containing the search string

      • delete

        void delete(String username)
        Deletes user of given username. Operation will fail if there are any other tables other than the user details table with foreign keys referencing the user.
        Parameters:
        username - username of user to delete
